labTest.subheader: Your gut is your second brain - what is it telling you?
labTest.desc1: Do you suffer in silence with digestive issues? Bloating, gas, constipation, diarrhoea and indigestion - these are messages from an unhealthy gut.
labTest.desc2: Gut problems cause and aggravate conditions- hay fever, anxiety, depression, chronic fatigue, skin health, Parkinson’s and Alzheimer’s.
labTest.desc3: Our tests translate the messages your gut is sending.
